rancher_registration_token.description: Provides a Rancher Registration Token resource. This can be used to create registration tokens for rancher environments and retrieve their information.

name.description: The name of the registration token.

environment_id.description: The ID of the environment to create the token for.

host_labels.description: A map of host labels to add to the registration command.

agent_ip.description: A string containing the CATTLE_AGENT_IP to add to the registration command.

command.description: The command used to start a rancher agent for this environment.

registration_url.description: The URL to use to register new nodes to the environment.

token.description: The token to use to register new nodes to the environment.
